caption.body: Happy Birthday to the late Isamu Noguchi, who was born on this day in 1904 in Los Angeles, California. Working across a wide range of disciplines with a deep sense of social purpose for more than six decades, the artist developed a uniquely open-ended, inclusive, and forward-looking perspective on global culture.   In 2018, SFO Museum and the Isamu Noguchi Foundation and Garden Museum (@noguchimuseum) presented an exhibition on the famed industrial designer and sculptor, “Isamu Noguchi: Inside and Out”. Featuring various stone and sheet metal sculptures and light fixtures, the exhibition celebrated works from the 1950s to the 1980s. Do you remember this exhibition? Relive the memories: https://bit.ly/3sJydHW
caption.excerpt: Happy Birthday to the late Isamu Noguchi, who was born on this day in 1904 in Los Angeles, California.
